          <title>
            <string language="en">Amplification of signals in optic fibres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verstärkung der Signale in den Optikfasern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Amplification des signaux dans les fibres 
optiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Amplification dos sinais em fibras óticas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Amplificazione dei segnali in fibre ottiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενίσχυση των σημάτων στις οπτικές ίνες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Amplificación de señales en fibras ópticas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These block diagrams show electrical (top) and optical (bottom) amplification of signals in optic fibres.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coupler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical amplification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">laser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light signals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optic fibres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optical amplification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">photodiode</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">signal amplification</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Blockdiagramme zeigen elektrische 
(Oberseite) und optische (untere) Verstärkung der Signale in den 
Optikfasern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces schémas fonctionnels montrent 
l'amplification (inférieur) électrique (dessus) et optique des 
signaux dans les fibres optiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas de bloco mostram o amplification 
(inferior) elétrico (alto) e ótico dos sinais em fibras óticas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi a blocchi mostrano l'amplificazione
(inferiore) elettrica (parte superiore) ed ottica dei segnali in fibre
ottiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα ομάδων δεδομένων εμφανίζουν 
ηλεκτρική (κορυφή) και οπτική (κατώτατη) ενίσχυση των σημάτων 
στις οπτικές ίνες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas de bloque muestran la 
amplificación (inferior) eléctrica (tapa) y óptica de señales en 
fibras ópticas.</string>
          </description>
